1.text1to2: You dive into the deep slime pool. After a long and terrifying swim through the submerged cave you emerge in a pitch black grotto.
1.text2to1: You jump back into the slime pool. You emerge in a slimy grotto.

2.text1to2: You squeeze yourself through the tight cave opening. You emerge on the other side.
2.text2to1: You head back into the cave. You emerge in a grotto.
